column5: This year bps has a rod trade-in deal similar to the reel trade-in.  Don't remember them doing that in the past in Canada.
I don't trade in used or new rods, I give 'em away to kids.
Actually, the rods have to be in working condition and they are donated to children's programs =)
Well that's a plus.  Guess I'm just eliminating the middle man and the long drive to BPS.
Anyone have the details on the rod trade in?
Next time ask, "Can anybody provide additional information?" lol
pullin teeth sometimes. rofl thanks man.  Is it only one trade in coupon per new rod?
Me too. I have 3 grandchildren now.

Looks like the reel trade in is March 9th-14th and then the rod trade in is the 16th to 20th - 2 trips Yikes!  The Ontario store site is starting to post the sale details by day and programs but as yet has not released the actual flyer as far as I can see.  Check out the Auburn store and that should be close if you want a sneak peak at the flyer
